## IToolbox interface

Interface for a toolbox.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IToolbox extends IRegistrable, IFocusableTree 
```
**Extends:** [IRegistrable](./blockly.iregistrable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IFocusableTree](./blockly.ifocusabletree_interface.md)

[refreshSelection()](./blockly.itoolbox_interface.refreshselection_1_methodsignature.md)


</td><td>

Updates the flyout's content without closing it. Should be used in response to a change in one of the dynamic categories, such as variables or procedures.


</td></tr>
